00001 /************************************************************************
00002  *
00003  *  A sample taylor.h
00004  *     Here is a list of macros/functions needed to compile the auto
00005  *     generated taylor polynomial procedure.  
00006  *
00007  */
00008 
00009 
00010 /***********************************************************************
00011  *
00012  * Code generated by the TAYLOR translator.
00013  */
00014 
00015 #ifndef _TAYLOR_H_
00016 #define _TAYLOR_H_
00017 typedef double MY_FLOAT;
00018 
00019 #include<math.h>
00020 #include<stdio.h>
00021 #include<stdlib.h>
00022 #include<string.h>
00023 /*
00024  *  MY_FLOAT is the data type to be used in computing derivatives. 
00025  *  It may be 'float', 'double' or user defined private data types
00026  *  like 'doubledouble', 'complex' etc. 
00027  */
00028 
00029 /* for double or doubledouble, don't need to initialize */
00030 #define   InitMyFloat(r)            
00031 #define   ClearMyFloat(r)           
00032  
00033 /* assign b to a */
00034 #define   AssignMyFloat(a, b)       {(a)=(b);}
00035 
00036 /* create a MY_FLOAT from a, assigne to r. a is an integer or a float */
00037 #define   MakeMyFloatA(r,a)         (r=(double)(a))
00038 
00039 /* create a MY_FLOAT from string, a is an integer or a float, s is its string representation */
00040 #define   MakeMyFloatC(r,s,a)       (r=(double)(a))
00041 
00042 /* create a MY_FLOAT from a, assign to r and return r */
00043 #define   MakeMyFloatB(r,a)         (r=(double)(a),r)
00044 
00045 /* addition r=a+b   */
00046 #define   AddMyFloatA(r,a,b)        (r=(a)+(b))
00047 
00048 /* substraction r=a-b */
00049 #define   SubstractMyFloatA(r,a,b)  (r=(a)-(b))
00050 
00051 /* multiplication r=a*b */
00052 #define   MultiplyMyFloatA(r,a,b)   (r=(a)*(b))
00053 
00054 /* division r=a/b */
00055 #define   DivideMyFloatA(r,a,b)     (r=(a)/(b))
00056 
00057 /* division by an integer r=a/i */
00058 #define   DivideMyFloatByInt(r,a,i) (r=(a)/(double)(i))
00059 /* negation r=-a*/
00060 #define   NegateMyFloatA(r,a)       (r= -(a))
00061 
00062 /* square root r=sqrt(a) */
00063 #define   sqrtMyFloatA(r,a)         (r=sqrt(a))
00064 /* exponentiation r=a^b */
00065 #define   ExponentiateMyFloatA(r,a,b)  (r=pow((a),(b)))
00066 /* exponentiation r=a^b, b is an integer */
00067 #define   ExponentiateMyFloatIA(r,a,b)  (r=pow((a),(double)(b)))
00068 /* sin(a)  r=sin(a) */
00069 #define   sinMyFloatA(r,a)          (r=sin((a)))
00070 /* cos(a)  r=cos(a) */
00071 #define   cosMyFloatA(r,a)          (r=cos((a)))
00072 /* tan(a)  r=tan(a) */
00073 #define   tanMyFloatA(r,a)          (r=tan((a)))
00074 /* atan(a) r=atan(a) */
00075 #define   atanMyFloatA(r,a)         (r=atan((a)))
00076 /* exp(a)  r=exp(a) */
00077 #define   expMyFloatA(r,a)          (r=exp((a)))
00078 /* log(a)  r=log(a) */
00079 #define   logMyFloatA(r,a)          (r=log((a)))
00080 /* sinh(a) r=sinh(a) */
00081 #define   sinhMyFloatA(r,a)         (r=sinh(a))
00082 /* cosh(a) r=cosh(a) */
00083 #define   coshMyFloatA(r,a)          (r=cosh(a))
00084 /* tanh(a) r=tanh(a) */
00085 #define   tanhMyFloatA(r,a)          (r=tanh(a))
00086 
00087 
00088 /* log10(a)  r=log10(a) */
00089 #define   log10MyFloatA(r,a)         (r=log10((a)))
00090 /* fabs(a) r=fabs(a) */
00091 #define   fabsMyFloatA(r,a)          (r=fabs(a))
00092 
00093 /* convert to int */
00094 #define   MyFloatToInt(ir,fa)       (ir=(int)(fa))
00095 /* convert to double */
00096 #define   MyFloatToDouble(ir,fa)    (ir=(double)(fa))
00097 
00098 
00099 /* boolean operation  */
00100 #define   MyFloatA_GE_B(a,b)        ((a)>=(b))
00101 #define   MyFloatA_GT_B(a,b)        ((a)> (b))
00102 #define   MyFloatA_LE_B(a,b)        ((a)<=(b))
00103 #define   MyFloatA_LT_B(a,b)        ((a)< (b))
00104 #define   MyFloatA_EQ_B(a,b)        ((a)==(b))
00105 #define   MyFloatA_NEQ_B(a,b)       ((a)!=(b))
00106 
00107 
00108 /************************************************************************/
00109 
00110 #endif

00112 MY_FLOAT **taylor_coefficients_rtbp2dv(MY_FLOAT t, MY_FLOAT *x, int order);
00113 
00114 MY_FLOAT **taylor_coefficients_rtbp2dvA(MY_FLOAT t, MY_FLOAT *x, int order, int reuse_last_computation);

00116                           double log10abserr, double log10relerr,
